title: Daily internet usage per capita worldwide 2011 - 2021 , by device
summary: Overall Mobile is rapidly increasing, Desktop is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Time in minutes, in descending order is: 1. Mobile, and lastly, 2. Desktop.
Mobile reported the lowest Time in minutes about 32.0 in Year 2011
The greatest difference of Time in minutes between Desktop and Mobile occurs at Year 2018 and the smallest difference occurs at 2013.
min_summary: Overall Mobile is rapidly increasing, Desktop is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
mid_summary: Overall Mobile is rapidly increasing, Desktop is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
max_summary: Overall Mobile is rapidly increasing, Desktop is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The minimum Time in minutes about 32.0, occured at 2011 by Mobile.
The greatest difference of Time in minutes between Desktop and Mobile occurs at Year 2018 and the smallest difference occurs at 2013.
